summary: Spriggans Drop Wood enables you to harvest the Deadwood and Branches added by Chesko's Campfire from the corpses of spriggans and burnt spriggans.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71601-0-1448585714.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64798][img]http://i.imgur.com/kPyl4AD.png[/img][/url][/center]

Spriggans Drop Wood enables you to harvest the Deadwood and Branches added by Chesko's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64798/]Campfire[/url] from the corpses of spriggans and burnt spriggans.

[color=#ffff00]There are multiple versions of Spriggans Drop Wood, as described below:[/color][list]
[*]The BASIC version adds 1 Deadwood and 2 Branches to spriggans, and 1 Deadwood to burnt spriggans. If you use Wrye Bash, it will get incorporated into your Bashed Patch (saving you an esp slot).
[*]The EXTRA version adds 2 Deadwood and 4 Branches to spriggans, and 2 Deadwood to burnt spriggans. If you use Wrye Bash, it will get incorporated into your Bashed Patch (saving you an esp slot).
[*]The VARIABLE version adds 1-2 Deadwood and 2-4 Branches to spriggans, and 1-2 Deadwood to burnt spriggans. It won't get incorporated into your Bashed Patch, but it should merge easily with other files using TES5Edit or mator's Merge Plugins Standalone.
[*]The NO CAMPFIRE version adds 2 Firewood to spriggans and 2 Firewood to burnt spriggans. It doesn't require Campfire. If you use Wrye Bash, it will get incorporated into your Bashed Patch (saving you an esp slot).
[/list]
[size=6][color=#00ff00]Requirements[/color][/size]
[list]
[*]Skyrim
[*]Dragonborn
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64798/]Campfire[/url]
[/list]
[color=#00ff00][size=6]Installation[/size][/color]
Download one of the files and extract its contents into the Data folder.

[size=6][color=#00ff00]Recommended[/color][/size]
Depending on which version of Spriggans Drop Wood that you're using, you can save yourself an esp slot by using one of the following:
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1840/]Wrye Bash[/url]
[*][url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/3244464-merge-plugins-standalone-public-beta/]Merge Plugins Standalone[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/]TES5Edit[/url] with mator's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37981/]Merge Plugins xEdit Script[/url]
[/list]
There are other great mods that rely on Campfire, and the wood that you gather from dead spriggans can be used to craft some of the items they add:
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66468/]Dig Site - Relic Hunter Tents for Campfire[/url] by Rusey
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70146/]WITCH - Campfire Tent[/url] by Rusey
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70352/]Simple Campfire Stuff[/url] by Faelrin
[/list]
author: DrMonops
